short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate reading time for blog posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover how long it will take to read any blog post with just a click! The Blog Reading Time Calculator is a handy Chrome extension designed for avid readers, students, professionals, and anyone looking to manage their reading time effectively. This tool is perfect for quickly gauging the time investment required for articles, helping you plan and prioritize your reading sessions.

Key Features:

Instant Reading Time Estimates: Click the extension icon, and immediately see how many minutes it will take to read the active webpage.
Universally Compatible: Works on any web page that contains text. Whether it's news articles, blog posts, or lengthy reports, get a reading time estimate in seconds.
Simplicity and Ease of Use: No configuration needed. Install the extension, and it's ready to go.
How It Works:

Navigate to any blog or article.
Click on the extension icon.
View the estimated reading time displayed in a simple, clean popup.
Optimize your reading experience with the Blog Reading Time Calculator. Never overcommit to an article again. Install now and transform the way you read online!
